description:
To get back at his sister for bullying him, Chipmunk draws a graffiti sketch of her. And then unfortunately, she comes along and sees it. Trying to convince her it wasn`t him, he`s forced to help her search for a perpetrator who doesn`t exist. Will Chipmunk be able to keep his involvement secret?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Sis Is a Great Detective
